A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was OK but fails to live up to the hype. Poor casting in parts and far too many ‘comedy moments’ It lacked any real suspense and parts of the movie (casino planet) should have ended up on the cutting room floor because they added little (if anything) to the slender plot. Such a shame. All that said\, it passed the time and and it’s certainly not as bad as the prequels. Hopefully episode 9 will lose the comedy moments and focus more on a good plot\, better casting and a bit more of an edge.
